entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
